text: Having listened to and loved the most recent episode of 500 Songs about the Turtles and their songs, my friend said now you have to start with the first. I looked all over the web and I couldn't find a list. So I looked into their RSS feed. It's huge but they're all there, all the episdes. How am I going to parse this? Then I remembered I have it in my database. So I wrote a little query to get me the enclosureUrl of all items from that feed, and it worked. I love it when this happens.
